list.title: Studying computational thinking through collaborative design activities with Scratch
list.otherText: Poster to be presented at the 13th International Conference on Computer Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL), June 2019. Lyon, France: International Society of the Learning Sciences.

list.title: Utilizing the consensual assessment technique to compare creativity in drama spaces
